meanings.definition: A structure built on top of another structure.
meanings.sent1: The tall building had a large superstructures on its roof.
meanings.sent2: The architect designed the superstructures to provide additional support.
meanings.sent3: The superstructures on the playground were so high that they seemed to touch the sky.
meanings.sent4: The superstructures of the treehouse reached up like giant arms embracing the tree.
meanings.sent5: The superstructures of the bridge were painted in bright colors, making it a landmark.

meanings.definition: The part of a ship above the main deck.
meanings.sent1: The captain stood on the superstructures, scanning the horizon for land.
meanings.sent2: The crew members maintained the superstructures to ensure the ship's safety.
meanings.sent3: During the storm, the superstructures of the ship swayed with the waves.
meanings.sent4: The superstructures of the ship gleamed in the sunlight, a beacon on the sea.
meanings.sent5: The sailors gathered on the superstructures to watch the dolphins play in the waves.
